name: Agricultural Simulator 2013 - Steam Edition
description: Best In Farming!An idyllic farming environment surrounded by inviting & untilled mountain panoramas set in the beautiful landscapes of Tuscany, The Alps and USA await all fans of the Agricultural Simulator series.
minimum_requirements: OS:Windows: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor:2.2 GHz Dual Core (Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon X2) Memory:2 GB RAM Graphics:Geforce GTX 260 / Radeon HD 4850,  Shader Modell 2.0 or higher with latest driver DirectX®:9.0 or higher Hard Drive:2.5 GB space free         Periphery:Keyboard, Mouse Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
recommended_requirements: OS:Windows: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor:2.6 GHz Quad Core (Intel Core i5, AMD Phenom X4) Memory:4 GB RAM Graphics:Geforce GTX 560 / Radeon HD 7790,  Shader Modell 3.0 or higher with latest driver DirectX®:9.0 or higher Hard Drive:2.5GB space free         Periphery:Keyboard, Mouse Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

reviews.review_text: It is a nice looking farming game with many new creative ideas that no other farming game has. Too bad that the developers didn't have time/money to finish making the game. The game is so buggy you cant even play it. I have a brand new gaming computer wich can run BF4 on Ultra settings with no lag (and many other demanding games) but this game is so badly optimized it's not even playable. I bought it on the release day for over a year ago and the devs has not made anything to make it more playable since then. So DO NOT BUY THIS GAME!
DO NOT BUY IT

Ok, I didn't expect much of this when I bought it but this has to be to most incomplete title published (EVER!). Don't buy this, especially if you actually want to play a real world version of FarmVille.

No. Not even worth my 99 cents I payed for it.

When this game works, it is pretty fun, however it is mostly broken. Random crashes, lots of glitches, hard to earn money/make progress, very broken in-game UI, lacking features and hard to get used to.  I picked this up when it was on sale for $3 or so. The developers have basically abandoned this game, what it had to offer, and left a lot of other users, including myself, disappointed and annoyed.
Launched the game got  this error  [i.imgur.com]   10/10 would create DirectX texture

Table of Contents: - Foreword - Graphics - Gameplay - Sounds - Controls - Quality - Overall Experience   -Foreword I looked at some reviews, most of them saying the game's ♥♥♥♥, some saying its the most amazing Farming Simulator - which is definetly not my opinion. The game feels unpolished, i really expected more after seeing those reviews.  -Graphics The textures themself were not too bad but required you to be in a range of 30m to even really see them. For example grass, road, tree's. You can look at the screenshot i took when i was ingame. Its basically total sh!t. Btw. the field of view is like 50-60, which is insanely close and feels like sh!t too.  -Gameplay The gameplay is pretty bad. I've not played much because my tractor instantly fell over. There was no way to flip it up again, so i was basically ♥♥♥♥ed. To get into the tractor you press leftclick on that little thing that pops up, to get out you press y, whyever... There are like no GUI's, no HUD, if you aim on something like wood there are some little icons popping up which you can click on. I'm personally not a fan of that, but it obviously increases gameplay.  -Sounds Well, the music was pretty decent. Not Simulator-like music. Well, its not really the type of music i enjoy though. Kinda reminded me of the game 'Barney' (where you play that cow, i loved it x3). I didnt really listen to the other sounds, if they were bad i'd have noticed though.   -Controls The controls are pretty weird. There are like no GUI's, no HUD, if you aim on something like wood there are some little icons popping up which you can click on. I'm personally not a fan of that, but it obviously increases gameplay. (Sry for copy pasta)  -Quality The overall quality is pretty bad. The game feels insanely unpolished. Like in every UIG Game, it changes the OS-Resolution, even though it's autodetecting stuff to set your video options before starting. Well... The FOV is 50-60 as i said, im not a fan of it. Road only laods when you're in the range of ~30m, otherwise its insanely bugged. Grass does only load in a range of like 10m. There is no HUD or anything, you just get extra menu's by holding TAB, C or other stuff which were pretty confusing. There is no way to flip your tractor, mine's fallen over like 5 minutes after i got into the game. RIP me.  -Overall Experience Defiently one of the worst faming simulator games out there. There are so many games which are much better and more enjoyable. I would definetly not recommend the game to anyone.
The game LAGS bad and Sun and weather looks terrible. But graphics are amazing! Buy at your own risk. the game has good potential. but can't play it any more cause the loading cursor wont go away.
DONT BUY THIS GAME!!! IS NOT WORKING, YOU CAN'T OPEN IT. CRASH ON STARTUP! STEAM PLEASE REMOVE THIS GAME FROM STORE!!!!
For the love of all that is good and holy, avoid. It has 3.8/10 for a reason. The 2011 version is bad, but not this bad. Multiplayer is non-existent here.
Had to edit some files to get the game to even run, and even then it only ran at maximum 25FPS on a high-end system.

The game isn't working, at the beginning it even didn't start, now when i try to start a new game, it keeps crashing. Trying to contact steam support and they tell me to contact the developer about fixing this problem or a money refund. I try to contact the developer and they don't even respond to my email? This game is BS and Steam should remove it from their store and refund the people who bought this crap game, so thank you steam for protecting ♥♥♥♥♥♥ developers

If you're looking for a good simulator for farming/agriculture, this game is not your game. Perhaps, it may be much better if I WAS ABLE TO PLAY THE GAME RIGHT. The engine is actually really beautiful for a simulator and such, but that comes with a downside. It is terribly optimized. I have a really fair computer that actually meets the recommended requirements, yet I can barely top off 30 fps (frames per second) on medium. In retrospect, I was not able to play this game. I can say that I really don't mind if the graphics are good or not, but when I can't get a respectable fps, it's too hard for me to play.  The driving is abyssal with very simple physic calculations, like flipping over a tractor going five MPH and taking a small turn. Sadly, because of my previous woe with the performance, I was not able to try much of the game out, so for those with really powerful computers and want to try this, go ahead, but don't expect much.  The game would've been amazing if it wasn't for the ♥♥♥♥-poor performance with the engine.

Why is steam selling this huge steaming fly covered pile of duke? I would rather take a flurrie of punches to the junk then play this.. The worst glitch with this game is when you try to play it but instead end up screaming profanitys at the computer buck naked.   Save yourself an aneurysm and some $$....RUN AWAY!

I would not recommend buying this game because it is simply not finished. It seems to crash alot like it is in apha or beta. Also there is a option to hire a work hand, but he is not visable anywhere in the game world. I played 9 hrs and i have come to the conclusion that this game is not worth $9.99 because it is simply incomplete.
So... Where is this graphic from the screenshots ? Totally false screens and very bad game performance. DO NOT BUY !

I really cannot recommend this to anyone with some form of brain functioning still left. Graphics are horrendous, geometry is only visible within five meters and really the physics are just what you would expect. Terrible, I presume it is.

The reason I would not recommend this game is that I have played Farming Simulator 14/15. This game is not a bad simulator, but if you are going to spend your money on a farm sim, go with FS15. Every task in Agri Sim is just a little more complicated than it needs to be.

Waste of money. Couldn't treat customers right even on thier own forums. I was surprised when the game made it to steam but still never ran right even on high end machines. Advice buy stuff from Giants like Farming Simulator 2015.

No sound in Windows 10, after completing the tutorial starting a new game, no UI, no way of knowing if you have any money or where to buy equipment/supplies from. Fairly horrible really. I prefer Professional Farmer 2014, even though it does appear to have a great many bugs.
Buggy for years, no real guides, should not be sold on steam. shameful
Refund Please?

There is a reason the promotional video only shows vehicles moving about 10ft forward as a maximum, because if you drive further than this, the chances of you passing through the hard programmed space-time distorter and finding the laws of physics as you'd come to understand them turned upside down, grows exponentially with every passing second. You  will  eventually find yourself bouncing across your neatly ploughed field on the roof of your tractor, wondering who pulled the plug on reality.  As a simulation of agriculture 2/10 (there are farmyard animals, which I suppose must count for something, they have something to do with farms, right?). As a simulator of altered reality and of how agriculture might look in a universe of metaphysical vehicles that only exist conceptually, a physics dominated by a fluctuating gravitational force and where Albert Einstein toured his one-man balloon sculpting show from coast to coast 11.3333333333/10.
ITS A WASTE OF MONEY!
